body: Hello Avicus community, I am looking for someone who is good at making skins. I need a new skin, I like wearing Adidas I have brown eyes and dark brown hair. Yeah I just want a new skin make it creative. If there is anyone who can make skins.
body_tagged: Hello Avicus community, I am looking for someone who is good at making skins. I need a new skin, I like wearing Adidas I have brown eyes and dark brown hair. Yeah I just want a new skin make it creative. If there is anyone who can make skins.
title: Skins

replies.body:
Skins are for the weak.

(Steve master race)

replies.body: It's a shame my pro skin creating program broke and won't work ever since my new computer was bought. Seriously, this machine has some problems. Not gonna lie.
